stories.title: LG G Watch R
stories.body:
Smart Comes Full Circle

With Android Wear™ at its core, the LG G Watch R is the next generation to join the LG wearable's range. Sporting a stunning full circle Plastic OLED display, the LG G Watch R perfectly combines classic watch design with an advanced, easy to use, user interface. Delivering essential information, anytime, anywhere.

  • Stunning, Timeless Design
  • World's First Full Circle 1.3" P-OLED Display with sapphire glass protection
  • Compatible with Android 4.3+
  • High capacity 410mAh battery
  • 1.2 GHz Qualcomm® Snapdragon™ 400
  • IP67 Certified water & dust resistant
  • Heart Rate Monitor / Barometer / 9-Axis Sensor
  • Chronograph Watch Faces
  • Smart Notifications and Voice Recognitio

stories.title: LG G3 S
stories.body:
Premium Compact with True to Life Display

Enjoy super fast 4G speeds like never before with the LG F60. With a 5.0" true to life HD IPS display and an advanced 8MP camera with Laser Auto Focus, LG G3 S combines best-in-class technology all within a sleek, compact, metallic design. Plus, powered by a long lasting 2540mAh removable battery, you can stay connected all day long.

  • High Speed 4G LTE Connectivity
  • 4.5" WVGA In-Cell Display
  • Android 4.4 KitKat
  • Long lasting 2100mAh removable battery
  • 1.2GHz Quad-Core processor
  • Hassle Free Selfies with Gesture Control
  • Touch & Shoot Camera
  • KnockOn and KnockCode™

stories.title: LG G3 London Launch
stories.body: One of the highly anticipated phones of 2014 was officially launched in London on 27th May at an exclusive event. Watch the live stream of the event above.

stories.title: Android 4.4 KitKat OS Upgrade For G2 Smartphone
stories.body:
The anticipated Android 4.4 KitKat OS upgrade for the G2 smartphone has now been announced by LG. With Android 4.4 KitKat OS upgrade installed, it becomes more convenient to use. Running applications and web browsing speed is faster than before. Playing music more efficiently, supporting the battery saving location mode, extending battery life. Also, the handy new feature called Google Cloud Printer makes it easy to print out documents via Wi-Fi or Bluetooth connection.

Start to experience enhanced mobile experience through LG's premium phone G2.

media.alt: Image of LG G2 running Android 4.4 KitKat

stories.title: LG G Watch
stories.body: LG Electronics (LG) is working together with Google on the LG G Watch powered by Android Wear™, which extends e Android platform to wearables. The LG G Watch will be compatible with a wide range of Android™ smartphones and will present relevant formation to users just when they need it or whenever they say "OK Google" to ask questions or get stuff done. As one of Google's lead partners in this effort, LG is planning to introduce its first watch powered by Android Wear.

stories.title: Introducing the World's First Real Curved Smartphone!
stories.body: Setting a new milestone in the evolution of the smartphone, LG Electronics (LG) today officially took the wraps off the LG G Flex, a smartphone curved to follow the contour of the face, the first device to offer such a design in the smartphone market. The latest device in LG's premium G Series, the G Flex incorporates proprietary innovations from other LG companies in the form of the display and battery that have never been seen before. The LG G Flex also boasts new user experience (UX) features that take advantage of the curved form factor.

media.alt: Image of curved LG G Flex

stories.title: LG and Google Introduce Google Nexus 5
stories.body: LONDON, UK, 31st November 2013 â€” Following the success of Nexus 4, LG and Google have partnered again to deliver the first smartphone featuring the latest Android operating system, Android™ 4.4, KitKat®. Packed with new features, Nexus 5 is the slimmest and fastest Google Nexus phone to date. With a stunning 5-inch Full HD IPS display, Nexus 5 boasts an expansive screen for an unrivaled visual experience. The lightweight smartphone comes in both 16GB and 32GB versions and is the perfect combination of powerful performance, functionality and convenience thanks to LG's proven hardware and best of Google software and services.
